name: Protect the Rocket!
description:
Protect your rocket! Tap to defeat enemy ships. The sooner you tap, the more points you earn. But be careful! You have to hold your fire and save friendly pink aliens. Destroy a pink alien or fail to defeat an enemy ship and it's game over!

Speech synthesis is enabled by default to read out information for low vision players. Simply tap the top-right speech pause button to disable this feature. An additional game speed feature is also included for accessibility, to allow players to play at their own pace.

Game Design and Programming: AJ Ryan @ONLYUSEmeFEET

Sound: Charlie McCarron @CharlieMcCarron

Made during Train Jam 2017 with the theme "Unexpected Anticipation."
